name: Winter Puzzle Free
description:
Winter is one of the brightest seasons, not only because of the Christmas glitter, but also because of the white fluffy snow. Snowy and cold – Winter gives us the chance to start over, to go out and make snowmen, play with snow balls, practice our favorite winter activities such as skiing, sledding or snowboarding. It is the most magical season. There are some marvelous winter landscapes in our gallery. Pick a picture from the gallery, choose your difficulty level and enjoy the puzzle.
If you can't find your picture in our selection, pick one from your device or take a picture with your camera and turn it into a jigsaw puzzle.
As soon as you are done with the pieces you can share your result with your friends or challenge someone else to solve it faster. You can also set the picture as a wallpaper to have it on your display and enjoy the picture on your device.

Our gallery contains the following categories:
• Snow
• Landscapes
• Snowmen

The features of our puzzle:
• It is not required to have internet access to play the puzzle game (works in offline mode)
• Many nice high definition pictures sorted in a cute gallery
• Lots of difficulty levels
• Smooth game-play. (Uses the hardware acceleration of the device.)
• Game timer.
• Share result/picture.
• Multitouch zoom and piece rotation
• Zoom In / Out.
• Piece rotation.
• Save game.
• Best score statistics.
• Set picture as wallpaper.
• Nice background music.
• Magical sound effects.
• Vibration when pieces merge.
• Kids mode
• Winter puzzle is free.
